type.en: Course with defence at the end

structural_units.address:
Narva mnt 18
51009 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Independent research work. The thesis is written in accordance with the requirements and guidelines  and is defended at public disputation.
description.et: Iseseisev teaduslik uurimistöö, mis vastab esitatud nõuetele ning kaitstakse avalikul väitlusel kaitsmiskomisjoni ees.

objectives.en: The aim of the master's thesis is to obtain in-depth knowledge and skills of a narrower field of speciality and acquire experience in independent research together with skills in compiling a research manuscript.
objectives.et: Magistritöö eesmärgiks on omandada sügavamaid teadmisi ja oskusi kitsamas eriala valdkonnas ning omandada iseseisva uurimistöö kogemusi koos oskusega koostada uurimuslikku kirjalikku tööd.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who has successfully defended a master's thesis:
1. has in-depth knowledge of a narrower field of the specialty
learning_outcomes.et: 1. tunneb sügavamalt ühte eriala kitsamat valdkonda

learning_outcomes.en: 2. can formulate the main positions of the field of specialty
3. can critically analyse the positions published in the specialty literature both in his or her own language and in a foreign language
learning_outcomes.et: 3. oskab kriitiliselt analüüsida erialakirjanduses avaldatud seisukohti nii ema- kui võõrkeeles

learning_outcomes.en: 4. can present his or her positions, conclusions and generalisations and argumentatively justify them
learning_outcomes.et: 4. oskab esitada oma seisukohti, järeldusi ning üldistusi ja neid argumenteeritult põhjendada

learning_outcomes.en: 6. can examine and analyse empirical data
learning_outcomes.et: 6. oskab uurida ja analüüsida empiirilist materjali

learning_outcomes.en: 7. can defend his or her views and presented theses and critically assess them
learning_outcomes.et: 7. oskab kaitsta oma seisukohti ja esitatud teese ning neid kriitiliselt hinnata
8. oskab rakendada erinevaid teadusliku uurimistöö meetodeid

learning_outcomes.en: 9. is aware of the requirements applicable to research
